cartoons.name: Ben 10
cartoons.description: A young boy, Ben Tennyson, finds an alien watch that allows him to transform into different alien species.

cartoons.name: Teen Titans
cartoons.description: A group of young superheroes, led by Robin, battle villains and navigate teenage life.

cartoons.name: Spider-Man
cartoons.description: Peter Parker, a teenager bitten by a radioactive spider, becomes the superhero Spider-Man.

cartoons.name: Batman: The Animated Series
cartoons.description: Bruce Wayne fights crime in Gotham City as the masked vigilante, Batman.

cartoons.name: Jackie Chan Adventures
cartoons.description: Follows Jackie Chan and his family as they recover powerful magical artifacts.

cartoons.name: Oggy and the Cockroaches
cartoons.description: Oggy, a lazy cat, is constantly troubled by three mischievous cockroaches.

cartoons.name: Shinchan
cartoons.description: A mischievous 5-year-old boy, Shinchan, creates hilarious chaos in his family and school life.

cartoons.name: SpongeBob SquarePants
cartoons.description: A cheerful sea sponge named SpongeBob goes on hilarious adventures in the underwater city of Bikini Bottom.

cartoons.name: Minions
cartoons.description: Minions are small, yellow creatures known for their mischief and funny language, serving villains in history.

cartoons.name: Tom and Jerry
cartoons.description: The never-ending chase between a clever mouse, Jerry, and a determined cat, Tom.

cartoons.name: Mickey Mouse
cartoons.description: The adventures of Mickey Mouse and his friends in the magical world of Disney.

cartoons.name: Looney Tunes
cartoons.description: A collection of hilarious animated shorts featuring Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, and other classic characters.

cartoons.name: Popeye the Sailor
cartoons.description: A strong sailor who gains super strength after eating spinach, often rescuing Olive Oyl.

cartoons.name: Scooby-Doo
cartoons.description: A talking Great Dane and his gang solve spooky mysteries in this classic detective cartoon.
